Female Accountant Job at Global HR Always




        
    

        
        Global HR Always is an HR Support firm carrying out HR functions for and on behalf of our clients. We are recruiting for our client, a majorimporterand distributorof frozen fish in West Africa.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Female Accountant
Job Location: Benin City, Edo
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities
The accountant will be responsible for:
     

            
    




	Ensure that financial requisitions are justifiable.
	Inspect financial records to ensure accuracy and overall legal and regulatory compliance.
	Calculate taxes owed, prepare tax returns, and complete financial tax transactions.
	Balance the company budget.
	Ensure financial statements are organized and maintained at all times.
	Notify management of any non-compliant employee financial practices.
	Reconcile accounts with the general ledger.
	Handle general account queries.
	Preparation of payroll.
	Bank reconciliation.
	Miscellaneous task to support the executive in discharging her duties. Etc.


Requirements


	Experience: Minimum of 7 years of previous experience as a corporate Accountant.
	Minimum Educational Qualification: Minimum of Second-Class Upper Degree in Accounting. First class will be an added advantage.


Skills and Competencies:


	Proficient computer skills, including the ability to prepare a spreadsheet.
	Good oral and written communication.
	Ability to communicate effectively with all levels of staff. Etc.





Salary
N250,000 - N300,000 Monthly.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their updated CV to: globalhralways@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.
